recommendations.summary: The system shows no immediate security issues or compliance flags, but proactive measures are recommended for data quality and cost optimization.

recommendations.title: Establish GDPR/CCPA Compliance Framework
recommendations.description: Implement a framework to ensure ongoing compliance with GDPR and CCPA regulations, including data subject rights and data processing agreements.
action_items: Conduct a data inventory to identify personal data and its processing activities.
Develop and implement data subject request procedures.

recommendations.title: Regular Security Audits
recommendations.description: Schedule regular security audits to maintain a proactive security posture, even in the absence of detected issues.
action_items: Create a quarterly security audit schedule.
Engage third-party security experts for comprehensive assessments.

recommendations.title: Implement Cost Monitoring Tools
recommendations.description: Introduce tools to monitor and analyze job costs to identify trends and potential savings.
action_items: Integrate cost monitoring solutions into the existing platform.
Review job execution patterns to optimize resource allocation.

recommendations.title: Enhance Data Quality Governance
recommendations.description: Establish data quality metrics and governance practices to ensure the integrity and reliability of data used in the platform.
action_items: Define key data quality metrics and establish baseline measurements.
Implement data validation processes to ensure ongoing data integrity.

recommendations.title: Define and Monitor SLOs
recommendations.description: Define Service Level Objectives (SLOs) for critical operations and monitor adherence to ensure operational excellence.
action_items: Identify key performance indicators (KPIs) relevant to SLOs.
Set up monitoring tools to track SLO adherence and report deviations.
